Recipe 1: Description: A classic comfort food, this recipe combines the simplicity of baked eggs with the warmth of crispy toast. Simply crack an egg into a baking dish, season with salt and pepper, and bake at 375°F for 10-12 minutes or until the whites are set. Meanwhile, toast some bread and top it with butter. When the eggs are done, place them on top of the toasted bread and serve.
Recipe 2: Description: A simple and delicious meal that's perfect for a busy evening. Preheat your oven to 400°F. In a bowl, mix together 1/2 cup of quinoa, 1/2 cup of water, and 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Pour the mixture into a baking dish and top it with some frozen vegetables (such as peas, carrots, or corn). Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the quinoa is tender.
Recipe 3: Description: A fun twist on the classic grilled cheese sandwich, this recipe adds a layer of sweet and savory goodness. Butter two slices of bread on one side each. Place one slice, butter-side down, in a pan over medium heat. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese and sliced apples on top of the bread. Once the cheese starts to melt, place the other slice of bread, butter-side up, on top of the filling. Cook for 2-3 minutes or until the bread is golden brown.
